entry.value: select APD_ID, TRIP_START_DATE, TRIP_END_DATE, RECON_DATE, TRIPS_MADE, TRIPS_CHARGED, LATE_TRIPS, AMOUNT_CHARGED, RECON_FLAG, TRIPS_LEFT, UPDATE_TS, LAST_TX_DATE, USAGE_AMOUNT, FULL_FARE_AMOUNT, DISCOUNTED_AMOUNT, ETC_ACCOUNT_ID, PLAN_TYPE, LAST_LANE_TX_ID, LAST_TX_POST_TIMESTAMP, COMPOSITE_TRANSACTION_ID, CSC_LOOKUP_KEY from T_TRIP_HISTORY
